All functions

Delete a survey

Delete a user account

.check_token_file()

Check if token file is in working directory

.construct_oauth()

Construct Token Object Constructs and object for print method

.get_token()

Get Token Gets token from options.

.get_token_file()

Load credentials file

.encrypt() .decrypt()

Encrypt and Decrypt token Encrypt and decrypt for security, not saving plain credentials to file.

generate_distributionlink()

Generate a distribution link

get_distribution()

Retrieve a given survey distribution object

get_erasing_request lists all erasing requests

get_mailinglist()

Retrieve a specific mailing list

get_message()

get_message retrieve a message

get_organization()

get_organization retrieves organization level information

get_response_import_progress()

start_response_import_url imports a survey based on a loacl survey file

Retrieve an sms survey distribution object

get_survey()

Retrieve a survey

get_survey_languages()

Retrieve the list of languages in which a survey is available

get_survey_quota()

get_survey_quota retrieves the full translation

get_survey_responses()

get_survey_responses exports a survey into R Export survey responses into R and/or save exported file. Currently single exports calls are limited to 1.8 GB. Above that size, we recommend you split your export accross different date ranges

get_survey_responses_new()

Export a survey's responses into R

get_survey_translations()

get_survey_translations retrieves the full translation

get_user()

Retrieve a user account's information

get_user_api_token()

Returns the active api token for an account

import_survey()

Import a survey into Qualtrics

import_survey_fromurl()

Import a survey into Qualtrics based on a file URL

insert_embedded_data()

Insert embedded data fields into a survey

is_success()

Success?

List the survey links associated with a distribution

list_distributions()

list_erasing_requests lists all erasing requests

who_am_i()

Determine the user ID and other user information associated with an Qualtrics API token or a Qualtrics OAuth access token.
